text: Motion
Motion

G-Good morning...!
I-I'll be counting on you from today...!
Oh, you seem fired up, Koito.

Y-Yes...!
Since it's a, a training camp and all...

Haha... Are you okay, Koito?
Not getting too tense?

Eeek...!
Uh, well...

...I can feel your motivation, Koito.
But if you have any worries, just let me know.
...S-Since it's a special training camp, so...

I-I want to, to make sure
to achieve results...

...I see.
Then how about this?

You write down what you accomplished during each
day's lesson. Then, show me your notes the next day.
Notes...?

Even the smallest things, one by one,
It might take a bit of effort, but...

I can also confirm Koito's growth,
and I think it'll be beneficial for Koito herself.

......!
Y-Yes, you're right...!
Ah, but what should I write...?

Haha, you can just go and get them.
You have enough time for that.

Y-Yes...!
I'll go get them...!
